StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [RCTAPI_GetEventDataPartCached]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@edipi varchar(10) AS
--EXEC RSSOSS.dbo.RCTAPI_GetEventDataPartCached 1266694055 --DECLARE @edipi varchar(10) --SET @edipi = 1266694055
SET NOCOUNT ON SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
DECLARE @result varchar(max) DECLARE @tempJson varchar(max)
DECLARE @cutO.BeginDate date, @cutO.EndDate date
IF (EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'dbo' AND TABLE_NAME = 'RCTAPI_DateRange')) BEGIN
SELECT @cutO.BeginDate = ( CASE WHEN BeginDate_Datepart = 'year' THEN DATEADD( year, BeginDate_DateAddNumber, GETDATE()) WHEN BeginDate_Datepart = 'month' THEN DATEADD(month, BeginDate_DateAddNumber, GETDATE()) WHEN BeginDate_Datepart = 'week' THEN DATEADD( week, BeginDate_DateAddNumber, GETDATE()) WHEN BeginDate_Datepart = 'day' THEN DATEADD( day, BeginDate_DateAddNumber, GETDATE()) END ), @cutO.EndDate = ( CASE WHEN EndDate_Datepart = 'year' THEN DATEADD( year, EndDate_DateAddNumber, GETDATE()) WHEN EndDate_Datepart = 'month' THEN DATEADD(month, EndDate_DateAddNumber, GETDATE()) WHEN EndDate_Datepart = 'week' THEN DATEADD( week, EndDate_DateAddNumber, GETDATE()) WHEN EndDate_Datepart = 'day' THEN DATEADD( day, EndDate_DateAddNumber, GETDATE()) END ) FROM RSSOSS.[dbo].[RCTAPI_DateRange] WHERE RangeType = 'EVENT' END
IF @cutO.BeginDate IS NULL BEGIN SET @cutO.BeginDate = DATEADD(YEAR, -1, GETDATE()) END
IF @cutO.EndDate IS NULL BEGIN SET @cutO.EndDate = DATEADD(DAY, -62, GETDATE()) END
SELECT TOP 1 u.FirstName ,u.LastName ,rp.rowguid AS Recrui.ngPersonGuid ,ro.ORGANIZATION_ID ,ro.rowguid AS OrgGuid INTO #Recruiter FROM UserMgmt.dbo.[User] u INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.PERSON p ON u.FirstName = p.FIRST_NAME AND u.LastName=p.LAST_NAME INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION ro ON u.Sta.on_OrgUnitID = ro.OrgUnitId INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_PERSON rp ON rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = p.PERSON_ID AND rp.ORGANIZATION_ID = ro.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE Dis.nguishedName like '%' + @edipi AND u.IsAc.ve = 1 AND rp.ORGANIZATION_ID = ro.ORGANIZATION_ID ORDER BY LastAc.vityDate DESC
SET @tempJson = ( SELECT ev.[ID] AS eventId ,ev.[EventSourceId] AS eventSourceId ,ev.[EventTypeId] AS eventTypeId ,ev.[EventPrecision] AS eventPrecisionId ,ev.[IsComplete] AS isEventComplete ,ev.[IsApproved] AS isEventApproved ,ev.[Organiza.onId] AS organiza.onId ,ev.[Loca.on] AS eventLoca.on ,ev.[Comments] AS eventComments ,ev.[StartDate] AS eventStartDateTime ,ev.[EndDate] AS eventEndDateTime ,ev.[EventTypeOther] AS eventTypeOther ,ev.[OwnerId] AS eventOwnerId ,ev.[Remarks] AS eventRemarks ,ap.[MISApprovedEventStartDate] AS misApprovedEventStartDate ,ap.[MISApprovedEventEndDate] AS misApprovedEventEndDate ,ap.[WISApprovedEventStartDate] AS wisApprovedEventStartDate ,ap.[WISApprovedEventEndDate] AS wisApprovedEventEndDate
FROM RSSOSS.USMC.[Event] ev INNER JOIN #Recruiter r ON ev.Organiza.onId = r.ORGANIZATION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.[EventApproval] ap ON ev.ID = ap.ID WHERE ev.StartDate >= @cutO.BeginDate AND ev.StartDate < @cutO.EndDate
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('events'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES )
SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2)
SET @result = ISNULL(@tempJson, '"events":[]')
SET @tempJson = ( SELECT v.[ID] AS eventPersonVisibilityId ,v.[EventId] AS eventId ,v.[Recrui.ngPersonId] AS recrui.ngPersonId
FROM RSSOSS.USMC.[Event] ev INNER JOIN #Recruiter r ON ev.Organiza.onId = r.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN RSSOSS.[USMC].[EventPersonVisibility] v ON ev.Id = v.EventId WHERE ev.StartDate >= @cutO.BeginDate AND ev.StartDate < @cutO.EndDate
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('eventPersonVisibili.es'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES )
SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"eventPersonVisibili.es":[]')
SET @result = '{' + @result + '}' SELECT @result
DROP TABLE #Recruiter
